data.event: Background: Samra came to the U.S. in 1980 and went to work on his first day in the country at Micro Peripherals in Chatsworth.
He held himself to the same rigid standards when he formed Balqon in 2005.
Samra's office has that just-moved-in look, even though Balqon relocated seven months ago.
